resources.string: This widget requires permissions to access the Gadgets:

Without these permissions this widget cannot be used, since the system blocks the required access to the gadgets.\nTo be able to use this widget you will have to manually grant the missing permissions in the app\'s section of the system configuration.
To list the gadgets that have been registered to the system access to the central Bluetooth administration is required. For that these specific permissions are required:
"This app offers a simplified access to gadgets registered in the system. Usually that access is buried somewhere deep inside the system\'s configuration ."
"These widgets can be added to your device\'s home screen."

string-array.name: introduction_usage_steps
string-array.item: Touch and hold a free area on your home screen.
Select \"Widgets\" in the opening context menu.
Open the group \"Gadget Control Widgets\" in the list of available widgets.
Point onto one of the offered widgets and move it to a free area on your home screen.
You will have to confirm the permissions requested by the widget.
Detailed settings can be chosen inside the widget\'s configuration.

resources.string: "Widgets placed on the home screen can be modified, use a long press for that. They can be moved, resized and you can open their configuration. To remove a widget you simply drag it to the target "Remove" atop the home screen. "
